name: PG Model Agency
overview:
PG Model Agency script helps you to start an online modeling agency. Whether you’re thinking of setting up a Modeling Agency or already have an existing agency, our powerful solution is for you. You don’t need to have any technical knowledge, because our website script is rather simple in usage.

You can get your website up and run in few hours using our software solution and easy to use, user friendly, powerful web based admin interface.

The admin interface is integrated with content management system, using that you can manage the content of the entire website. Without any programming knowledge you can organize the modeling agency website with the help of our scripts.

You can run your own modeling agency website, easily set up your models’ profiles, pictures, videos and other details. Also you can add manage it as an modeling agencies portal - separate modeling agencies and charge them for the usage for the accounts.
